control_attributes.control_description: The organization conducts penetration testing [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] on [Assignment: organization-defined information systems or system components].
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization tests, validates, and documents changes to the information system before implementing the changes on the operational system.

Control Statement: The organization conducts penetration testing [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] on [Assignment: organization-defined information systems or system components].
